overview:
Aaron Clauson is Chief Technical Officer with responsibility for all technical development of Blueface Ltd ( http://www.blueface.ie )

Aaron completed his BE in Electrical Engineering from the University of Tasmania , Australia in 1997. He is a Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (1999), a Certified Novell Engineer (1999), and a Master Certified Novell Engineer (2000). Previous work experience includes software engineer and architect with Intel Ireland , designing and developing telephony services reporting and invoicing systems, and peer-to-peer content distribution and communications systems.

web_presences.title: Aaron is developper for the open source project : MySIPSwitch
